pages.text: $(item)Onion$() is a Vegetable Food item that can be grown by planting $(thing)Onion Seeds$().$(br)Mature onion crops drop 1 to 5 onions with no seeds. Bone Meal can be used on onions.$(br)$(item)Onions$() is the main ingredient in the $(pot)Crock Pot$() recipes for dishes like $(item)Bone Bouillon$() and has a vegetable value of 1 in the recipes.

pages.title: Onion
pages.text: $(item)Onion$() will naturally generate in the Savanna.
$(item)Onion Seeds$() can be crafted by the $(item)Onion$() in the Crafting Table.
